contentList:
Partial Blindness -- Acid damage Your eyes are damaged; you have Disadvantage on Perception checks that rely on sight and on ranged Attack Rolls. If you are already suffering from Partial Blindness and are inflicted with it again, you instead gain the Blindness injury.
Magic such as Lesser Restoration can restore your sight. -- Your eyes are damaged; you have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and on ranged attack rolls. Magic such as the regenerate spell can heal the damage to your eyes. If you have already suffered partial blindness, you're blinded. Ocular Damage -- Cold damage One of your corneas is damaged from frostbite. You have Disadvantage on Perception checks that rely on sight and on ranged Attack Rolls. If you are already suffering from Ocular Damage and are inflicted with it again, you instead gain the Blindness injury.
Magic such as Lesser Restoration can restore the damaged cornea. -- One of your corneas is damaged from frostbite. You have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and on ranged attack rolls. Magic such as the regenerate spell can restore the damaged cornea. If you have no corneas that remain undamaged after sustaining this injury, you're blinded. Systematic Damage -- Cold damage You have disadvantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution Ability Checks and Saving Throws.
Magic such as the Regenerate spell can cure the damage. -- You have disadvantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution ability checks and Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. Magic such as the regenerate spell cures this damage.
